subject: Sexual Health
title: Seminal Vesicles
description: A short lesson to help you apply Seminal Vesicles.

hook.text: Behind the bladder, two small pouches produce most of the fluid in every ejaculation.

buildup.text: These glands secrete a thick, fructose-rich fluid that gives sperm the energy to swim.

discovery.text: Seminal vesicle fluid makes up about 70% of semen volume and contains proteins that aid sperm survival.

twist.text: Without this fluid, sperm would lack fuel to reach the egg and would die within minutes.

climax.text: The seminal vesicles turn sperm into a viable delivery system capable of completing its journey.

punchline.text: Sperm need fuel. These glands provide the tank.

quiz.question: What percentage of semen comes from the seminal vesicles?
